item.title: Dancing the K-Means Dance
item.description: Dancing can be traced back to the origins of almost every society in the world. It is a way to communicate ideas and feelings in a free manner. [I would add something here about how dance is a simple, memorable and effective way to communicate? Maybe give an example of children’s dance songs in an educational/story telling context?
